query:
ALTER TABLE merchandise_items 
ADD COLUMN reorderPoint INT NULL,
ADD COLUMN reorderQuantity INT NULL,
ADD COLUMN averageDailyUsage VARCHAR(20) NULL,
ADD COLUMN lastCalculatedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN leadTimeDays INT DEFAULT 7,
ADD COLUMN safetyStockMultiplier VARCHAR(10) DEFAULT '1.5'
